auto_enrollment_notification_message.message: Click here to automatically enroll a pre-configured certificate.

cea_cep_network.message: Communicating with the configured CEP endpoint in the verified access enrollment flow failed. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_cep_template.message: No matching certificate template was found. Please contact your administrator.

cea_ces_denied.message: The certificate request was denied by the Certificate Authority.

cea_ces_network.message: Communicating with the configured CES endpoint in the verified access enrollment flow failed. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_ces_pending.message: The certificate request was left pending by the Certificate Authority. Please contact your administrator.

cea_error_other.message: An unknown error was encountered by the certificate enrollment agent during verified access enrollment. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_google_network.message: Communicating with the configured Google verified access server failed. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_google_reject.message: The verified access check was not successful for the Chrome identity of the signed in user on this device.

cea_invalid_api_version.message: Request from ChromeOS Certificate Requester did not match the expected version. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_ldap_network.message: Communicating with the configured LDAP server failed. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_ldap_user_verification.message: The username provided was not found or failed verification. Please check your username and try again. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_locked_contact_admin.message: The request failed due to lockout protection. Please contact your administrator.

cea_locked_try_again.message: The request failed due to lockout protection. Please try again later.

cea_malformed_request.message: Request from ChromeOS Certificate Requester did not match the expected format. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_no_api_failure.message: Could not access the enterprise.platformKeys API. Your device may not be enrolled in the domain.

cea_qps_reject.message: The request was rejected to due to too many requests per second. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

cea_timed_out.message: Getting a certificate through the verified access enrollment flow timed out. If this continues, contact your administrator.

cea_va_failed.message: The user's identity could not be confirmed with the verified access API.

certificate_renewal_failure_alert.message: Failure: an error occurred while renewing a certificate. More details can be found on the console logs.

extension_description.message: Demander un certificat pour votre appareil

generate_challenge_response_failed.message: Unable to create a challenge-response for enrolling with Verified Access. If this continues, contact your administrator.

get_challenge_failed.message: Getting a challenge from the Verified Access endpoint failed. If this continues, contact your administrator.

get_challenge_timed_out.message: Getting a challenge from the Verified Access endpoint timed out. If this continues, contact your administrator.

invalid_credentials.message: Impossible de valider vos nom d'utilisateur et mot de passe sur le serveur. L'un des deux est incorrect (ou les deux).

invalid_policy_var.message:
Vous avez spécifié une variable de règle incorrecte.
Nom de la variable : $1
Valeur de la variable : $2

kerberos_authentication_text.message: Your admin has configured certificates to be issued using Kerberos authentication. Click the $1 button to request a certificate. Kerberos tickets can be obtained via Chrome Settings > People > Kerberos tickets.

login_cep_failure.message: Impossible d'établir le contact avec le serveur de règles.

login_device_help.message: Demander un certificat pour l'ensemble des données de l'appareil afin que les autres membres de votre organisation puissent utiliser ce dernier

login_enrollment_failure.message: Impossible d'effectuer l'inscription avec l'URI spécifié.

login_failure_alert.message: Échec : une erreur s'est produite. Des détails sont donnés dans les journaux de la console.

login_hide_pending.message: Masquer les autres champs pour vérifier les demandes en attente ?

login_invalid_character.message: Les caractères < et > ne sont pas autorisés dans ce champ.

login_query_uri.message: L'URI spécifié pour l'inscription est incorrect. Sa valeur doit commencer par "https".

login_service_account_help.message: Request a certificate using the acount details provided by your administrator.

login_show_pending.message: Afficher les autres champs pour vérifier les demandes en attente ?

login_success_alert.message: Opération effectuée : le certificat a été généré et importé.

managed_cep_empty_error.message: La variable "cep_proxy_url" n'est pas définie ou est vide.

managed_cep_http_error.message: La variable "cep_proxy_url" n'est pas définie sur "https".

managed_certificate_renewal_error.message: Vous essayez de définir la variable "enable_certificate_renewal" sur une valeur inconnue.

managed_company_url_http_error.message: help_url field in company_info not set to https.

managed_log_level_error.message: Vous essayez de définir la variable "log_level" sur une valeur inconnue.

managed_policy_handling_info.message: Traitement des nouvelles règles en cours...

managed_signature_algo_error.message: Vous essayez de définir la variable "signature_algo" sur une valeur inconnue.

no_certificates_to_renew.message: There are no existing certificates to renew.

policy_bad_response.message: Réponse incorrecte lors de la tentative de récupération des URI d'inscription. Message d'erreur : $1

policy_timeout_error.message: Request timed out when attempting to reach the CEP endpoint. Please try again later or contact your administrator.

renewal_generate_pkcs10_failure.message: Generating a new certificate request to embed in a renewal request failed.

renewal_notification_message.message: Votre certificat arrive bientôt à expiration. Cliquez ici pour le renouveler dès maintenant.

renewal_notification_title.message: Rappel relatif au renouvellement du certificat

renewal_request_key_pair_failure.message: Retrieving the key pair associated with the renewal certificate failed.

saving_bad_response.message: Réponse incorrecte lors de la tentative d'inscription d'un certificat. Message d'erreur : $1

saving_denied.message: Le serveur a refusé la demande de certificat.

saving_generate_digest_failure.message: Échec de l'importation de la clé publique de l'objet.

saving_generate_export_failure.message: Échec de l'exportation de la clé publique.

saving_generate_extract_failure.message: Key pair extraction and saving failed.

saving_generate_key_failure.message: Échec de la génération et de l'enregistrement de la paire de clés.

saving_generate_sign_failure.message: Échec de la signature de la dernière demande de certificat.

saving_no_cert_failure.message: Impossible de trouver un certificat à stocker dans la réponse.

saving_pending.message:
The server set the request to pending.
Request: $1
Reference: $2

saving_store_failure.message: Impossible de stocker le certificat de la réponse sur l'ordinateur.

saving_template_error.message: Le serveur a refusé la demande de certificat, car le modèle de certificat spécifié est incorrect.

saving_timeout_error.message: Request timed out when attempting to reach the CES endpoint. Please try again later or contact your administrator.

service_account_host_error.message: Could not retrieve service account credentials.

token_no_system_failure.message: Could not find a valid system token. Your device may not be enrolled in the domain, or you may not have rights to request a system certificate.

token_no_user_failure.message: Could not find a valid user token. Your device may not be enrolled in the domain.

token_system_unallowed_failure.message: L'inscription par certificat d'appareil n'est pas autorisée par la règle actuellement définie.
